duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform news, talk, music, comedic, or other format shows for broadcast entertainment.
Establish relationships with listeners by providing entertainment and information consistent with the target audience.
Prepare for air shifts using creativity and imagination in writing, producing, interviewing, and broadcasting on-air material.
Maintain a website personality page and participate in required station programming, promotions, and events.
Research and gain knowledge of subject matter for providing immediate non-scripted analysis/commentary.
Handle emergency inserts and serve as an ambassador for the radio station(s) in public.

education_certification.credential: 4-year college degree, preferably in Communications or Broadcast Journalism
